Article.ArticleTitle: Online Teaching Resources about Medicinal Plants and Ethnobotany.

AbstractText: Classroom exploration of plant-based medicines and ethnobotany is a timely and valuable way to engage students in science. This Feature highlights Internet-based resources to help teachers in primary and secondary classrooms incorporate lessons and activities to teach about plant medicines.
